short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps user of Salesforce Marketing Cloud to check important details upon sending out an email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight important things to check upon sending out an Email in Marketing Cloud
 - Target Audience
 -  Excluded Audience
 - De-duplicate subscribers
 - Send Timing
 - Email name
 - From email
 - Subject Line
 - etc.
